attributes.action: retract the controversial London Olympics 2012 logo and adopt the BBC Online readers favourite
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the London Olympics 2012 logo created by Wolff Olins retracted and replaced by the BBC Online Readers favourite created by Richard and Chris Voysey. It is simple, modern and is imaginitive in its use of the year 2012 intertwined with the London name. Search the BBC News website to see the logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
